## Project Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) for the acquisition of C4ISR R&D Services, as detailed in Annex A. This RFP aims to select a supplier that can provide the necessary C2 and Battle Management Capability for the Valcartier Research Centre.

## Tender Requirements

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
